trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollBarAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollBarAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollBarAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollBarAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollBarAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the word "ScrollBar".

A <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that has values of <xref:System.Double.NaN>, <xref:System.Double.NaN>; the only clickable points in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> are the child elements.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che ha valori di <xref:System.Double.NaN>, <xref:System.Double.NaN>; gli unici punti selezionabili in un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> sono gli elementi figlio.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollBarAutomationPeer"></xref> is laid out in a specific direction.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollBarAutomationPeer"> </xref> è disposto in una direzione specifica.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"></xref>, depending on the orientation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'elemento associato a questo peer di automazione contiene dati presentati all'utente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.
